entries.title: New Guide: Features & How-tos
entries.body: A concise in-app guide covering setup, splitting flows, balances privacy, and power-tips.

entries.title: Currencies: defaults + quick switch
entries.body: Pick a default currency in Account → Currency, and choose a currency per expense with the new picker.

entries.title: Payment modes: Personal vs Split
entries.body: Clearer flow for who paid vs who owes. If a payer has multiple methods, you’ll be prompted to pick one.

entries.title: Privacy: balance blur + 5s reveal
entries.body: Balances are blurred by default and auto-hide after 5s.

entries.title: Smarter split flow
entries.body: Auto equalize pay/owe with rounding fix.
